SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices

Klasse OrganizationControllerService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices.OrganizationControllerService
@Service public class OrganizationControllerService extends Object
This Class is the service for the OrganizationController class. It provides methods regarding organizations. The methods of the OrganizationController are mapped on them.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    • getOrganizations

      public List<Organization> getOrganizations()

      Gibt zurück:
      List of all organizations

    • getOrganizationById

      Returns a single organization with the given id.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to be returned
      Gibt zurück:
      the organization object

    • getOrganizationPreview

      public OrganizationPreview getOrganizationPreview(String organizationId, String token) throws InvalidAttributesException
      Returns the OrganizationPreview of the specified organization if the given token is valid.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to get the preview from
      token - the token to validate the request
      Gibt zurück:
      the OrganizationPreview with the data of the organization
      Löst aus:
      InvalidAttributesException

    • getEvents

      public List<Event> getEvents(String organizationId)
      Returns a list of events from a single organization specified by an id.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to get the events from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all events from the organization

      public Organization editOrganisation(String organizationId, Organization organisation)
      Overwrites an existing organization object with the given organization object.

      organisation - the organization object with the new organization information
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated organization object

    • sendInvitation

      public void sendInvitation(String organizationId, String email, OrganizationRole role)
      Sends an invitation link in a mail to a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to send an invitation link to
      email - the email to send the invitation to
      role - the role to set the account with the invitation to

    • acceptInvitation

      public void acceptInvitation(String organizationId, String accountId, String token) throws InvalidAttributesException
      Adds an account to an organization after the account owner accepted an invitation.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to add the account to
      accountId - the id of the account to be added to the organization
      token - the token to verify the invitation
      Löst aus:
      InvalidAttributesException

    • removeAccount

      public void removeAccount(String organizationId, String accountId)
      Removes a specified account from a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed

    • changeRole

      public void changeRole(String organizationId, String accountId, OrganizationRole fromRole, OrganizationRole toRole)
      Changes the role of a specified account in a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization where to change the accounts role
      accountId - the id of the account which role has to be changed
      fromRole - the role of the account before the change
      toRole - the role to change the account to

    • createEvent

      public Event createEvent(String organizationId, Event event, String accountId)
      Creates an event in the specified organization and adds the given account with the role organizer.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization in which to create the event
      event - the event to be created
      accountId - the id of the account which shall be used to create the event
      Gibt zurück:
      event which has been created

    • leaveOrganization

      public void leaveOrganization(String organizationId, String accountId)
      A specified account leaves a specified organization.
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed
